Praça da Sé 2 de setembro de 2017 16
Tully Social Network was developed in 2017 by FATEC Ipiranga students Eduardo, Jefferson, Jonathan and Matheus as part of their Undergraduate Thesis. Our mission: make a social network that works best for users that leave their home, so they can meet different places everyday! DEVELOPED BY Eduardo Diniz de Oliveira, Jefferson Kenichi Fukuda, Jonathan Bertoldi da Silva and Matheus George Vieira Version 1.0
